Enumeration.Name: DeviceType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Device type.
Enumeration.Description: Device type.

EnumEntry.Name: Transmitter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data stream transmitter device.
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream transmitter device.

EnumEntry.Name: Receiver
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data stream receiver device.
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream receiver device.

EnumEntry.Name: Transceiver
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data stream receiver and transmitter device.
EnumEntry.Description: Data stream receiver and transmitter device.

EnumEntry.Name: Peripheral
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controlable device (with no data stream handling).
EnumEntry.Description: Controlable device (with no data stream handling).

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Areascan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 2D sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: 2D sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Linescan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 1D sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Areascan3D

EnumEntry.Name: Linescan3D
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device outputs 1D range image.
EnumEntry.Description: Device outputs 1D range image.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.
Integer.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout of the specific Link.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of streaming channels supported by the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceStreamChannelEndianness
Enumeration.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Enumeration.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: DeviceStreamChannelPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

Integer.Name: DeviceEventChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of event channels supported by the device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of event channels supported by the device.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state. After reset, the device must be rediscovered.

Boolean.Name: PowerDown_Enable
Boolean.ToolTip: Set camera into PowerDown mode.
Boolean.Description: Set camera into PowerDown mode.

Enumeration.Name: PowerDown_Status
Enumeration.ToolTip: Shows if camera is in PowerDown status.
Enumeration.Description: Shows if camera is in PowerDown status.

EnumEntry.Name: Normal
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Camera is in normal power mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Camera is in normal power mode.

EnumEntry.Name: PowerDown
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Camera is in PowerDown mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Camera is in PowerDown mode.

Command.Name: PowerDown_Update
Command.ToolTip: Update the PowerDown status.
Command.Description: Update the PowerDown status.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: SensorTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Show number of taps of the camera sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Show number of taps of the camera sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: Sixteen
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 16 Tap.
EnumEntry.Description: 16 Tap.

EnumEntry.Name: Eight
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 8 Tap.
EnumEntry.Description: 8 Tap.

EnumEntry.Name: Four
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 4 Tap.
EnumEntry.Description: 4 Tap.

EnumEntry.Name: Two
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 2 Tap.
EnumEntry.Description: 2 Tap.

Enumeration.Name: SensorDigitizationTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Show number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: Show number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: One
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Single tap mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Single tap mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Two
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Dual tap mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Dual tap mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Four
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Four tap mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Four tap mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Eight
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Eight tap mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Eight tap mode.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image. The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: WidthInterface
Integer.ToolTip: Width of image on the camera interface (Number of columns).
Integer.Description: Width of image on the camera interface (Number of columns).

Integer.Name: HeightInterface
Integer.ToolTip: Height of image on the camera interface (Number of lines).
Integer.Description: Height of image on the camera interface (Number of lines).

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image.
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image.
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image.

Integer.Name: BinningBitshift
Integer.ToolTip: Additional bitshift after binning.
Integer.Description: Additional bitshift after binning.

Enumeration.Name: BinningSaturationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Additional bitshift after binning.
Enumeration.Description: Additional bitshift after binning. Saturation mode; 0: no saturation indication; 1: output data is saturated if one of the pixels of the binning region is saturated; 2: LSB of output data is set '1' if one of the pixels of the binning region is saturated, else it is set to '0'.

EnumEntry.Name: NoSatInd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No saturation indication.
EnumEntry.Description: No saturation indication.

EnumEntry.Name: SatIndPixel
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Output data is saturated if one of the pixels of the binning region is saturated.
EnumEntry.Description: Output data is saturated if one of the pixels of the binning region is saturated.

EnumEntry.Name: SatIndLSB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: LSB of output data is set 1 if one of the pixels of the binning region is saturated, else it is set to 0.
EnumEntry.Description: LSB of output data is set 1 if one of the pixels of the binning region is saturated, else it is set to 0.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Horizontal sub-sampling of the image. This reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image by the specified horizontal decimation factor.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: Vertical sub-sampling of the image. This has the net effect of reducing the vertical resolution (height) of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition. It represents all the informations provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter but combined in one single value.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 8 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 8 bit.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 10 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 10 bit.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 10 bit packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 10 bit packed.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 12 bit.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 12 bit.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Mono 12 bit packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Mono 12 bit packed.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Data Output Mode of the image
Enumeration.Description: Data Output Mode of the image

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Normal Mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Normal Mode.

EnumEntry.Name: LFSR
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Test image. Linear feedback shift registers: generates a pseudo-random image, so that errors can be identified in the complete image processing system.
EnumEntry.Description: Test image. Linear feedback shift registers: generates a pseudo-random image, so that errors can be identified in the complete image processing system.

EnumEntry.Name: Ramp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Test image. Values of pixels are incremented by 1, starting at each row.
EnumEntry.Description: Test image. Values of pixels are incremented by 1, starting at each row.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One frame is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire for each FrameBurstStart trigger.

Boolean.Name: EnAcquisitionFrameRate
Boolean.ToolTip: Enable AcquisitionFrameRate, otherwise camera runs in free running mode (max possible fps).
Boolean.Description: Enable AcquisitionFrameRate, otherwise camera runs in free running mode (max possible fps).

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: The camera is controlled by either the exposure time or the frame time.
Enumeration.Description: The camera is controlled by either the exposure time or the frame time.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameTime
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition frame time (in us) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition frame time (in us) at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameTimeMin
Float.ToolTip: Shows the min. possible frame time with the current settings.
Float.Description: Shows the min. possible frame time with the current settings.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateMin
Float.ToolTip: Shows the min. possible frame rate with the current settings.
Float.Description: Shows the min. possible frame rate with the current settings.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateMax
Float.ToolTip: Shows the max. possible frame rate with the current settings.
Float.Description: Shows the max. possible frame rate with the current settings.

Float.Name: MaxDataRateInterface
Float.ToolTip: Slow down the camera, if the sensor is faster than the interface. Value in MBit/Sec.
Float.Description: Slow down the camera, if the sensor is faster than the interface. Value in MBit/Sec.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Acquisition Trigger Wait.
EnumEntry.Description: Acquisition Trigger Wait.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Acquisition Active.
EnumEntry.Description: Acquisition Active.

EnumEntry.Description: Frame Trigger Wait.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frame Active.
EnumEntry.Description: Frame Active.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure Active.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure Active.

Boolean.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.
Boolean.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus_AcquisitionTriggerWait
Boolean.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.
Boolean.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus_AcquisitionActive
Boolean.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.
Boolean.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus_FrameTriggerWait
Boolean.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a frame start trigger.
Boolean.Description: Device is currently waiting for a frame start trigger.

Boolean.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame.
Boolean.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a frame.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus_ExposureActive
Boolean.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a frame.
Boolean.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a frame.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime feature.
EnumEntry.Description: The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime feature.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerControlled
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses one or more trigger signal(s) to control the exposure duration independently from the current trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses one or more trigger signal(s) to control the exposure duration independently from the current trigger.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Exposure time of the camera in microseconds.
Float.Description: This feature is used to set the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed.

Float.Name: ExposureTimeMin
Float.ToolTip: Min value of exposure time in microseconds.
Float.Description: Min value of exposure time in microseconds.

Float.Name: MaxFloat24BitReg
Float.ToolTip: Max float value [ms] if a 24bit register is used.
Float.Description: Max float value [ms] if a 24bit register is used.

Float.Name: MaxFloat32BitReg
Float.ToolTip: Max float value if a 32bit register is used.
Float.Description: Max float value if a 32bit register is used.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Digital All.
EnumEntry.Description: Digital All.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Float.Name: FineGain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: All.
EnumEntry.Description: All.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.

Float.Name: BlackLevelFloat
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: LUT0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: LUT 0.
EnumEntry.Description: LUT 0.

EnumEntry.Name: LUT1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: LUT 1.
EnumEntry.Description: LUT 1.

Boolean.Name: LUTEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates the selected LUT.
Boolean.Description: Activates the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.

Enumeration.Name: LUTAutoMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the AutoMode, the LUT will be calculated with the new AutoMode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the AutoMode, the LUT will be calculated with the new AutoMode.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Linear gain function. Y = 256 / 4096 * value * X.
EnumEntry.Description: Linear gain function. Y = 256 / 4096 * value * X.

Float.Name: LUTAutoValue
Float.ToolTip: Sets the AutoValue, the LUT will be calculated with the new AutoValue and AutoMode.
Float.Description: Sets the AutoValue, the LUT will be calculated with the new AutoValue and AutoMode.

Integer.Name: LUTOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset of selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset of selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Width of selected LUT.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Rising Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Rising Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Falling Edge of the signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Falling Edge of the signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter on the Falling or Rising Edge of the selected signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter on the Falling or Rising Edge of the selected signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter at Level High of the selected signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter Level High of the selected signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Resets the counter at Level Low of the selected signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Resets the counter Level Low of the selected signal.

Command.Name: CounterReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a Counter trigger is active.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a Counter trigger is active.

Command.Name: CounterUpdate
Command.ToolTip: Update the CounterValue.
Command.Description: Update the CounterValue.

Integer.Name: CounterValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.
Integer.Description: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.

Integer.Name: CounterStartValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the start value of the counter after reset event.
Integer.Description: Sets the start value of the counter after reset event.

Integer.Name: CounterValueAtReset
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.

Integer.Name: CounterDuration
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.
Integer.Description: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.

Enumeration.Name: CounterStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the current status of the Counter.

Command.Name: Counter3_Reset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a Counter trigger is active.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a Counter trigger is active.

Command.Name: Counter3_Update
Command.ToolTip: Update the Counter3_Value.
Command.Description: Update the Counter3_Value.

Integer.Name: Counter3_Value
Integer.ToolTip: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.
Integer.Description: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.

Integer.Name: Counter3_StartValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the start value of the counter after reset event.
Integer.Description: Sets the start value of the counter after reset event.

Integer.Name: Counter3_ValueAtReset
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.

Integer.Name: Counter3_Duration
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.
Integer.Description: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated.

Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the Counter.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the current status of the Counter.

Float.Name: Timer2_Duration
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.

Float.Name: Timer2_Delay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer.
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer.

Command.Name: Timer2_Reset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected timer and starts it. The timer starts immediately after the reset unless a timer trigger is active.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected timer and starts it. The timer starts immediately after the reset unless a timer trigger is active.

Float.ToolTip: Sets the start value of the timer after reset event.
Float.Description: Sets the start value of the timer after reset event.

Command.Description: Restores the settings from the factory preset area to the default boot up set.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Size of the payload in bytes. This is the total number of bytes sent in the payload. Image data + chunk data if present. No packet headers.

Integer.Description: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features from changing during acquisition.

Boolean.Description: It indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Boolean.Description: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the subnet mask of the given interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the subnet mask of the given interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent IP address for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent IP address for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the persistent default gateway for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the persistent default gateway for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second (frequency in Hz).

Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: Sends a test packet.
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

Integer.Name: SCPSMin
Integer.ToolTip: Min limit of stream packet size.
Integer.Description: Min limit of stream packet size.

Integer.Name: SCPSMax
Integer.ToolTip: Max limit of stream packet size.
Integer.Description: Max limit of stream packet size.

Integer.Name: SCPSInc
Integer.ToolTip: Increment of stream packet size.
Integer.Description: Increment of stream packet size.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in 10ns unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in 10ns unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
